bio.p: Weisan Chen is a professor at the Department of Biochemistry and Genetics, La Trobe University in Melbourne, Australia. He earned a Ph.D. in Immunology at Flinders University in Adelaide in 1994. During 1996â€“2000, he took a postdoctoral position at the National Institutes of Health (NIH), Bethesda, Maryland, U.S. During this time, he discovered the 11th IAV gene product PB1-F2. He returned to Australia in 2001 and established his independent T Cell Laboratory at the Ludwig Institute in Melbourne. He joined La Trobe University in 2012.
